alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 10:29AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, west central Warren, eastern Putnam, Hancock, southeastern Greene, southern Taliaferro and southeastern Jones Counties through 1100 AM EST ... At 1029 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Carey to near Gordon, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sparta, Crawfordville, White Plains, Siloam, Sharon, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Midway-Hardwick, Liberty, Meriwether, Springfield, Veazey, Beulah, Allenwood, Powelton, Plant Harlee Branch, Hardwick, Browns Crossing, and Shoulderbone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren
